CREATE PROCEDURE [ConEd].[usp_Upload_10_ProcessSinglePeriodMeterBilling]
AS 
    BEGIN
	
	
	/*
	put single period data into ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
	*/
        BEGIN
            TRUNCATE TABLE ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
            DBCC CHECKIDENT ('ConEd.[UploadConEdisonMeterSummary]', RESEED, 1)


            INSERT  INTO ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeterSummary
                    (AccountUtilityCompanySeqid
                    ,OriginalAccountNumber
                    ,OriginalMeterNumber
                    ,BillingPeriod
                    ,BillingPeriodRevision
                    ,FirstCancelPeriod
                    ,NumberOfTransactions
                    ,NumberOfRebillTransactions
                    ,NumberOfCancelTransactions
                    ,BillingAction
                    ,GasRateCode
                    ,InitialCancelFromDate
                    ,CurrentBillingToDate
                    ,FromDate
                    ,ToDate
                    ,MeterFromReading
                    ,MeterToReading
                    ,Ccf
                    ,Therms
                    ,ThermsFactor
                    ,MeterConstant
                    ,TotalBillingDaysRebilled
                    ,NumberOfBillingPeriods
                    ,BillingDays
                    ,BillingDate
                    ,ReadingCode
                    ,NumberOfDials
                    ,MeterType
                    ,ProcessEffectiveDate
                    ,SpannedBillingPeriodRevision
                    ,SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod
                    ,SpannedCCF
                    ,SpannedThermFactor
                    ,SpannedTherm
                    ,SpannedMonthlyPercentage
                    ,SpannedTotalPercentage
                    ,AuthenticatedUserID
                    ,Notes
                    ,DateAdded
                    ,LastUpdate
                    ,InitialPostingDate
                    ,EstimatedOrActualBilling
                    ,AverageRebillThermsFactor
                    ,PriorRevisedBilledCCF
                    ,RevisedBilledCCF
                    ,CanceledBilledCCF
                    ,PriorRevisedBilledTherms
                    ,RevisedBilledTherms
                    ,CanceledBilledTherms
                    ,FacilityName
                    ,ServiceAddress
                    )
            SELECT  9 AS AccountUtilityCompanySeqid
            ,       AccountNumber
            ,       MeterNumber
            ,       BillingPeriod
            ,       CASE WHEN BillingPeriod < BillingPeriodRevision THEN BillingPeriod ELSE BillingPeriodRevision END AS BillingPeriodRevision
            ,       CASE WHEN BillingPeriod < BillingPeriodRevision THEN BillingPeriod ELSE BillingPeriodRevision END AS FirstPeriodCanceled
            ,       1 AS NumberOfTransactions
            ,       1 AS NumberOfRebillTransactions
            ,       0 AS NumberOfCancelTransactions
            ,       CASE WHEN BillingPeriod = BillingPeriodRevision THEN 'O' ELSE 'A' END AS BillingAction
            ,       [dbo].[DetermineConEdisonGetGasTariffRateFromAccountTable](AccountNumber, BillingPeriodRevision) AS GasRateCode
            ,       FromDate
            ,       ToDate
            ,       FromDate
            ,       ToDate
            ,       FromReading AS FromMeterReading
            ,       ToReading AS ToMeterReading
            ,       CCF
            ,       CAST(CCF * dbo.DetermineConEdisonGetThermFactorFromAccountTable(AccountNumber, BillingPeriodRevision) + .501 AS INT) AS Therms
            ,       dbo.DetermineConEdisonGetThermFactorFromAccountTable(AccountNumber, BillingPeriodRevision) AS ThermFactor
            ,       MeterConstant
            ,       [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](FromDate, ToDate) AS TotalBillingDaysRebilled
            ,       DeltaNumberOfPeriods AS NumberOfBillingPeriods
            ,       [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](FromDate, ToDate) AS BillingDays
            ,       [dbo].[ConvertDatetimeToYYYYMMDD](PostingDate) AS BillingDate
            ,       ReadingCode
            ,       Dials AS NumberOfDials
            ,       'G' AS MeterType
            ,       NULL AS ProcessEffectiveDate
            ,       CASE WHEN BillingPeriod < BillingPeriodRevision THEN BillingPeriod ELSE BillingPeriodRevision END AS SpannedBillingPeriodRevision
            ,       CASE WHEN BillingPeriod < BillingPeriodRevision THEN BillingPeriod ELSE BillingPeriodRevision END AS SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod
            ,       CCF AS SpannedCCF
            ,       dbo.DetermineConEdisonGetThermFactorFromAccountTable(AccountNumber, BillingPeriodRevision) AS SpannedThermFactor
            ,       CAST(CCF * dbo.DetermineConEdisonGetThermFactorFromAccountTable(AccountNumber, BillingPeriodRevision) + .501 AS INT) AS SpannedTherm
            ,       1.0 AS SpannedMonthlyPercentage
            ,       1.0 AS SpannedTotalPercentage
            ,       1 AS AuthenticatedUserID
            ,       NULL AS Notes
            ,       GETDATE() AS DateAdded
            ,       GETDATE() AS LastUpdate
            ,       GETDATE() AS InitialPostingDate
            --,       CASE WHEN ReadingCode < 15 THEN 'EST' ELSE 'ACT' END AS EstimatedOrActualBilling
			,		dbo.CalculateEstimatedOrActual(ReadingCode,9) AS EstimatedOrActualBilling
            ,       1.00 AS AverageRebillThermsFactor
            ,       0 AS PriorRevisedBilledCCF
            ,       0 AS RevisedBilledCCF
            ,       0 AS CanceledBilledCCF
            ,       0 AS PriorRevisedBilledTherms
            ,       0 AS RevisedBilledTherms
            ,       0 AS CanceledBilledTherms
            ,       FacilityName
            ,       ServiceAddress
            FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonMeter
            WHERE   DeltaNumberOfPeriods < 2
  
        END -- ends  

   

    END
